website_summaries.verdict: Fast and easy pro-quality results with a dependable consumer model. Rock solid for big jobs like house painting.
pros: Covers large areas with minimal overspray and maximum precision
Not as heavy duty as pro models but includes extra-durable pump and decent quality gun
Best for medium and large jobs
cons: Cleaning its hose, nozzle, and other parts is time consuming but not complicated

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning the gun is allway most important
customer_reviews.text: I have been a professional painter for over 25 years. The gun is so hard to clean to make work properly I would never buy one again. Plus there is a gasket in the tip that after one time of use needed to be replaced and Wagner does not show that gasket anywhere to be purchased therefore I can't used it until some one can tell me where I can find that gasket. don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Home depot told me it was no good but I did not listen
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a mistake it was to buy this. Home depot told me it was no good but I did not listen. So basically if you want to spray water or any NON-interior paint you are fine probably, otherwise it will clog within minutes. That is even using the spray tip the paint manufacture recommends. I had painted one interior door before it clogged. I called Wagner and they said to thin the paint! I'm sorry, is it 1959? No one who is normal buys paint and then thins it to paint the interior of there own home!!!! Oh and cleaning this is quite fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Volante

customer_reviews.title: Nice paint sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer did a fine job once I figured out how to use it. The prime/spray knob seems to be less than desired. Mine fell off with the first gallon of paint I sprayed. I pressed the press nut back on and it has been fine since. The sprayer does not spray air when the paint can is empty, it just runs continuously without building pressure (I did not see this mentioned in the manual). I did have one clog in 5 gallons of paint sprayed. I did not thin the paint. Make sure the hose is connected before you prime it because paint may come out even though it is supposed to only go to the return tube.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING what a good tool can do!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried on multiple occasions to cobble pieces together and make a workable solution for my air compressor to spray stain on my fence. After many wasted hours and lots of stained clothes and wasted stain, I finally broke down and bought this thing. It's not the high end, but it felt like solid gold. It sprayed quickly and evenly and made short work of 50+ feet of fencing. My kids (the ones I gave all the dirtiest jobs to) love that I got this thing and now they get to skip the staining jobs because I won't let anyone else touch my Wagner!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Never Has Painting Been More Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to paint but I offered to stain a neighbors fence if they bought this and the stain. I knocked out a 400 foot long fence front and back in 3 hours. It was quite easy to understand and use. Now I am trying to get more neighbors to let me do their fences!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Black

customer_reviews.title: I love this sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Best airless sprayer ever this little bad boy has sprayed my whole house inside and out and a friends house too. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use but clogs frequently
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to paint the exterior of the my mountain cabin. It worked great as long as you follow the directions to the letter. It did frequently clog requiring me to stop, clean the trigger assembly and hose intake filter but I was still pleased with the end result. I gave it three stars due to all of the times it clogged up. Thin out your paint and it won't clog as much.
customer_reviews.author: BrianB

customer_reviews.title: what a HEADACHE
customer_reviews.text: i was very excited after having watched the QVC video on this... and i had a handyman over who knows his stuff we first used 'water' to test -- and it worked perfect but the first time we use 'Home Depot Behr Latex Paint'? CLOGGED!!! would not spray to Wagner's credit, we called their 800 number on a saturday afternoon and within seconds a LIVE person answered! He was very helpful... but this is just a bad bad product
customer_reviews.author: B. Pennell

customer_reviews.title: Great tool + incredible time saver!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, as a first time paint sprayer user. There are all kinds of training videos to watch prior. I highly recommend doing that before you start! You don't want to spend a lot of time learning how to clean, AFTER your job is done.
customer_reviews.author: GSam

customer_reviews.title: Wagner Control Pro 190 Paint Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this machine, because most paint ask for spaying tips to be as high as .21 and this machine can do that with no problem. Plus its easy to figure out how to use and clean. From just a week end worrier. Happy painting
customer_reviews.author: Joe G. Garner

customer_reviews.title: I thought Wagner was a household name we come to trust?
customer_reviews.text: This product by far, uses to much paint. You can’t control the flow of the paint and how much your spraying on the wall. I’m screaming, because I just used a half of a gallon on paint in one area of the room. Where as I had to get the roller and spread the paint over the wall correctly. Waste of money and my time. We had to paint 2500 sq ft. So disappointed, Wagner is suppose to be a household name
customer_reviews.author: Diane Alexander Jones

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working within about 20 minutes of my first use. I phoned customer service. They tried to help but in the end suggested that maybe I should not use it with stain, which is what I bought it to use for. I returned it and instead got a Graco Magnum Project Painter Plus. I'm really glad I did. It worked from the outset and I was able to finish staining about 1000 feet of fence relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Thought I'd stain my own fence...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the unit, very easy to setup and use, little disappointed that the filter and extra spray nosal didn't come with the unit, but as it turned out the nosal that come with it worked just fine with stain. Also very very easy to clean, just run clean water through the gun, over all very happy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait for so long to buy a decent sprayer?
customer_reviews.text: Set up is a breeze and clean up is just as easy. No lugging around heavy bulky airless sprayers and fighting with them anymore. I was able to completely spray my kitchen ceiling and clean up the machine in less than 45 minutes. My other sprayer, well that would have been over an hour from start to finish. Highly recommend this sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: PANDA 🐼🐼

customer_reviews.title: This Paint Sprayer is well worth the money and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I used the sprayer for 2 indoor rooms with 11' ceilings (15x16 and 16x20 room sizes). I also used it to paint my sisters log home. It was very easy to use, setup and go. The hose length was fine as well but even where I needed a bit more reach - the bucket is only 1.5 gallons of paint FULL - so it is not too heavy. For clean up - again it was very easy and quick. I used only latex paints for all painting with it. I would definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Y.

customer_reviews.title: Spray Painting Made Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This small but mighty paint sprayer gets the job done. It was very quick and easy to assemble. We used it to spray our interior doors and they turned out exactly how I expected with a satin finish. Clean up was just as easy although it took a while to get all the paint flushed out after the first use. It is compact and fits well back in the original box for storage. Ready for the next project.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product - Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product does not perform. It's made for indoor paint -- maybe. I used the correct nozzle per the label on the paint container. It worked for about two short sprays and then wouldn't spray anything. Cleaned and primed it three times and still couldn't get it to spray porch paint. Unfortunately, I missed the return date by one day. Tough lesson. Maybe since Wagner was bought up, they'll come up with some good products but then again, I won't be trying any more.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: very poorly designed equipment.
customer_reviews.text: user unfriendly. misnamed: "PRO" . hose rigid, does not uncoil and tips the whole machine at slightest move. customer service was contacted asking for replacement to more flexible hose. reply: no better quality hose available and as is, its is good enough for home -owner user! it is not for Professional user i was told. THE NAME " PRO 170" IS FOR MARKETING PURPOSE ONLY. very disappointing. we shall never touch a WAGNER PRODUCT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: veronese studio

customer_reviews.title: You might get refunded for the item but you won't get refunded for all the wastes paint!!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE PRODUCT! Money gone down the drain. Do not buy this product! The air spray hose gets clogged with the paint and trying to clean it wastes paint and a lot of time. Nothing like they show in those videos. I don't know how this product shows 4 stars, and it should be more like 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Lisi and Wes

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome and will make you want to do more projects!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! I sprayed my cabinet and got a professional finish. Make sure to Ora twice before using to get use to the feel. If your doing kitchen cabinets make sure to spray thin layers. Don’t listen to the reviews about paint spilling from the machine. That happened because they didn’t read the instructions that said to make sure the connections are tight. One more thing, you cannot use any other spray tip or gun unless it specifically says it is for an HEA sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This sprayers manual say not to thin paint so I did not. I have been a painter for over 15 years and used many paint sprayers and this one is bad!!! Used it with oil primer and kept getting clogged and at some points it would just spit out globs of paint witch ruined the doors I had to sand them down and start from scratch. I eventually thinned the paint and still no luck, tried 4 different types of tips and again no luck and those spray tips are NOT cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan-friggin-tastic!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fan-friggin-tastic! You will not be disappointed with this product. Cuts painting time in half. I was done earlier than anticipated and was drinking cold beer by supper time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We've borrowed and tried many sprayers from hand held a to the uprights. This is by far the best. Fast easy setup. One of the easier and fastest to clean. Couldn't be happier. We paid ted 3 exterior walls, a fence and some lawn chairs in just a few hours. Would have been faster but needed to do a paint run. Wish the power cord was longer, but otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: Steve Caprara

customer_reviews.title: Really good, worth  the money but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars because - It is more difficult to operate and get a good result than shown in the online videos especially the QVC videos - It does use a lot of paint and the gun Jam often which require to waste more paint - It is really fast to paint big job
customer_reviews.author: Frederic torres

customer_reviews.title: Does its Job
customer_reviews.text: I really like the item. Want to caution to read book first. Make sure it is "primed" Will pull right out of a five gallon bucket too. Just set the sprayer on a old lawn chair. Worth the Buy? Yea
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and maintain. Be prepared though it does use paint very quickly but not inefficiently you just have to get use to it as it supplies excellent coverage on th surface you are painting just wish it had a secondary siphon hose to draw directly from the paint can.
customer_reviews.author: Augie

customer_reviews.title: Hose needs swivels
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed stain on my entire house. I really liked the sprayer, however, the hose kept coiling and tangling. This would be a perfect unit if swivels could be put on hose. This keeps me from giving a perfect review rating.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Palusak

customer_reviews.title: Shed painted in No Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this spray painter to paint my new shed, I did not want to thin the paint and this unit works great. Painted the shed in no time and the clean up was easy, Ready for the next paint job.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer!!
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed all of my kitchen cabinets with this sprayer, it is very easy to use and clean. you can also store it for up to 16 hours without cleaning it to finish the next day! would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: HILARY

customer_reviews.title: Its not just for paint!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product performs well for me, although I use it in an unconventional manner. I use My Wagner Pro150 to apply liquid fertilizer and biological insecticides to my medical garden. It works lime a dream. I get even coverage every time. And... The amount of "product" needed to cover the crops has decreased by 30% over conventional garden sprayers. The only drawback is that the high pressure hose is not as flexible as I would like. All in all, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deedubya

customer_reviews.title: worked for about two hours
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about two hours then I noticed paint was leaking from the motor housing. A few minutes later it lost pressure and completely died. My money was refunded. I am grateful for the good customer service that amazon has but I would not purchase this unit again.
customer_reviews.author: trevor

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to push stain.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to do exterior staining. Purchased additional tip (313) as recommended for stains. Pro 130 wouldn’t push stain through recommended tip. Advice from manufacturer was to use paint thinner to thin the stain. I want full strength stain, not a thinned product. Went with Gracie instead. Would not recommend this for exterior stains.
customer_reviews.author: Jack DeLong

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: We love it . Painted our small home with it in no time. Only problem we had is keeping track of that nozzle gasket but they gave us a new on!
customer_reviews.author: gardenclown

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: Pressure problems, poor spraying pattern. I would spend double and buy a Graco sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L

customer_reviews.title: no good for heavy paints! Max tip is 515 under 015. Check your Paint before purchase
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for painting my garage walls. The paint was too thick (according to customer service) for the device. the paint required 015 -021 tip. I spent two days trying to figure out why it was not spraying. it worked for about 2 walls and that was it. I ended up purchasing a Greco X7 and that did the work.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Yes worth the money a must buy
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with this paint sprayer , very easy to use and the best part your done painting in way less time and with such a easy clean up , amazing worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Holds alot of paint and finishes a job quickly, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sprayer so much! I had the smaller version that was heavy to hold while spraying and was very inconsistent with how well it would work. This one does clog up easily but is so simple to clear the clog. Can paint multiples projects so quickly! I plan a day of it and am done in minutes! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Used to stain a wooden fence. Took hours out the usual time to stain it. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Filter
customer_reviews.text: Does the 130 wagner paint sprayer include the white or red filter? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ESR

customer_reviews.title: Great for out doors
customer_reviews.text: Painted 4 carports with it in one day took about 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned during first use
customer_reviews.text: Spray nozzle was completely jammed. Had to return to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: RebelDebutante

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA !!!!  Buy Graco Magnum sprayer= MADE IN USA
customer_reviews.text: When it works , it works great... Now that its 15mo old.... it's one thing after another.... currently no suction on p/u...cleaned inlet valve as described ... STILL DOES NOT WORK !!!!!😡 Horrible to clean when finished using !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: what is the difference between model of P 150 and the last one
customer_reviews.text: I really satisfy with using Wagner Control Pro 150 Paint Sprayer, high efficiency Airless Low Over spray after arriving it at home after the machine arrive at home in Indonesia. thank you for your cooperation. we used it easier and finished the result of painting quickly. we plan to buy the other one, that has many options to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Hakim

customer_reviews.title: turns a jackass into a pro painter
customer_reviews.text: great results. so damn fast. days in minutes. but burns paint at a rate of knots. so good I'm not going to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Crockodillin

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I love it effortless, seems like it paints by itself
customer_reviews.author: tony smith

customer_reviews.title: Getting Home Projects Done Faster.
customer_reviews.text: Currently remodeling our home to include painting. Boy what a neat tool and has helped me get the paint jobs much faster. The clean up is quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lamont Williams

customer_reviews.title: Grass Painting!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I used it to paint my grass because we have Bermuda grass which freezes in the winter and goes dormant which just looks so ugly so I went ahead and got grass paint and it was done in no time! It was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany N. Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: Paint
customer_reviews.text: I let Wagner know for the Val spar paint & stain I was using from Lowe’s it clogged up the nozzle in 20 min. Wish it wold have worked it would have made my life a lot easier..
customer_reviews.author: Fireman

customer_reviews.title: badly leaked, followed instructions
customer_reviews.text: Leaked. I did follow directions exact. Even watched a video to be sure. Very messy. Not easy to clean Mild Electrical shock when trying to clean for return -validated it was going back Returned the same day I received it
customer_reviews.author: lisa ann fadden

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product only lasted for one use and it broke I would never recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I used it twice and the second time the cheap plastic washer came out of the top and would not go back. I called support and their solution was to send me another washer. This was a major dissapointment.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: It’s complicated
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot of steps to get it up and running as well as cleaning it up. The sprayer on mine will get clogged often making the sprayed paint come out uneven. Wish I would have purchased something easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Aron

customer_reviews.title: Read the instruction
customer_reviews.text: Great sprayer for that price range. Works just fine. I haven't tried doing any fine painting with it, but for wall painting is more than good.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a spray paint machine before and I I really didn’t under stand the instructions but YouTube helped and easy to use and clean and work definitely works great
customer_reviews.author: Omar mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to stain our backyard fence, made incredibly short work of the task. It did clog a couple times but it was relatively easy to clean out. No regrets buying this
customer_reviews.author: Pedrre

customer_reviews.title: If you want a paint job done quick this is the machine to get
customer_reviews.text: Great product I painted my Parents barn And all the fence took me 4 hrs two colors and I had a couple of plugs but easy to clean nozzle with hose 😃
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Didn’t work. Followed the step by step instructions and the paint just oozed out of the nozzle. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Die after 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Wastage of money it only works for 20 or might be 25 minutes then it die
customer_reviews.author: tausef malik

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any homeowner.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for every homeowner to have. Make any room, wall, door look new with a new layer of paint!
customer_reviews.author: Jose B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once but I painted my garage in less than an hour. It’s worth every penny of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Daehn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The only tip included didn’t state if good for paint and stain, used with stain it didn’t work well. Then we bought a paint tip and it was great
customer_reviews.author: SHARON WRENSCH-CWIRLA

customer_reviews.title: Cuts paint time in half.
customer_reviews.text: Wagner painter worked great. Works well for inside work as long as everything taped and covered due to over spray. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide pattern with some what of an over spray issue
customer_reviews.text: Sprays a wide pattern and has quiet a bit of overspray.
customer_reviews.author: kacey dewberry

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product, saves a lot of time, easy to use and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Troopah

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the DIYer
customer_reviews.text: Works well for DIY use. Easy clean up and less overspray than my larger airless that finally quit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a paint sprayer and the wagner PRO 130 is perfect for me. Is very easy to use and assemble
customer_reviews.author: LUIS S. TARTABU

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was better than average
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, works great was as advertised great product
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Like very easy to use and clean. I painted 190 foot fence with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times and already leaking out of the bottom
customer_reviews.author: C gagalski

customer_reviews.title: Rese
customer_reviews.text: It wastes an enormous amount of paint, it drips, and it spills residues of paint everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a dysfunctional piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: it leaked right of the box,made a big mess,user unfriendly,hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Gianni A.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product leaked from main unit. I’m waiting for Wagner to replace it
customer_reviews.author: Mona L Gugliotti

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as cheaper model twice as much and finish isn’t any better than the hand held
customer_reviews.author: Brad vandenburg

product_meta.title: Wagner Control Pro 150 Paint Sprayer, High Efficiency Airless with Low Overspray
product_meta.description: Size:Control Pro 150The Control Pro 150 High Efficiency Airless takes the fear out of airless spraying, making it easier to paint like a pro. It’s an ideal airless paint sprayer for any homeowner who wants to apply a superior finish on exterior siding, decks, fences, garage doors, sheds, walls, ceilings, and more. The electric spray gun features a High Efficiency Airless spray tip that decreases overspray and outputs a consistent, soft spray pattern. This sprayer decreases overspray up to 55 percent compared to traditional standard airless sprayers and the durable pump lasts up to 3x longer than competitive models. It has several design features to make your next painting project easier; you can easily adjust the pressure control knob to regulate the paint flow. The sprayer is also stationary, has integrated storage for holding spare tips, and draws paint directly from a 5 gallon bucket, which is convenient for when painting large projects. For a model with more power and different features, check out the Control Pro 170 sprayer.
feature_bullets: AIRLESS SPRAYER FOR LARGE PROJECTS: The Control Pro 150 High Efficiency Airless paint sprayer applies a consistent, high quality finish on large home improvement projects such as decks, fences, exterior house siding, interior walls, and more

HIGH EFFICIENCY AIRLESS TECHNOLOGY: The paint sprayer features HEA technology that decreases overspray by up to 55% while delivering softer spray, improving control and providing a more-consistent finish
HOW IS IT DIFFERENT? This Control Pro sprayer has a max operating pressure of 1500 PSI, can spray up to 175 gallons per year, and utilizes a 25 ft. hose to easily spray projects
POWERFUL SPRAY GUN: The durable and powerful paint spray gun has a .55 horsepower HEA pump that can spray unthinned materials
LONG LASTING SPRAY SYSTEM: The HEA pump features a rebuildable fluid section that maximizes sprayer life and is backed by the industry’s best and longest warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars424 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
